Description:
Convenient Location, Corner Block, Must be Sold!
You will not find a more convenient location at this entry level price. Within minutes walk to Westall Primary/Secondary College/Train Station and moments from Springvale Shopping Centre makes this an ideal site for your dream home or build 2 townhouses side by side (STCA).
The home is in original condition and can be rented out while your plan is with the council or knock it down and build your 40 plus squares home in a location that is family friendly and will continue to experience strong growth.
Don't miss your opportunity to grab a bargain so bring your bids on Auction day (Deceased Estate must be sold)!!!
Features:
2 bedrooms with BIR's
Sun room/possible 3rd Bedroom
Separate Lounge/Dining
Landsize 590m2 approx (18.5m Frontage)

Description:
Corner block potential!! (620sqm)
This blonde 3 bedroom BV residence situated on a generous wide corner allotment offers outstanding potential for home-buyers to just move in and enjoy this neat and appealing family home, or the astute investor/developer to take full advantage of this property and position and develop into a multi-unit site (S.T.C.A). Comprising polished floorboards, living room, 3 bedrooms, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dining area, central bathroom, 2nd shower, 2 toilets, gas heating, split system cooling, rear verandah and single lockup garage. Land: 620sqm approx.
George Korderas : 0417 521 080

Description:
RENOVATED & READY TO LIVE IN OR RENT OUT
Tastefully updated and freshly painted in neutral tones, this three bedroom home is simply ideal for first home buyers or investors (with an estimated rental return of $1900 pcm). It offers a large light-filled lounge/dining room with stunning floorboards and an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. The master bedroom features a 2-way bathroom that is connected to the powder room and central bathroom. Added comforts include ducted heating and meals area beside the kitchen. Outside, the backyard is a great place to host family barbeques with direct access to a play park behind. Car accommodation is endless with a huge brick garage with extra space for storage and long driveway for more off road parking. In a convenient location, there are parklands all around, and in close proximity to Clayton South Primary School, Clayton train station and shops, Monash University and all amenities.

Description:
A MODERN FAMILY SIZED TOWNHOUSE WITH OWN FRONTAGE
With more space than you might expect, this street front townhouse could easily accommodate a growing family while retaining the low maintenance nature people seek in this style of housing. Behind its thoroughly modern facade you find 2 living zones including a front lounge and a tiled family/dining area incorporating the stone topped kitchen with gloss cabinetry, a corner pantry and stainless appliances including a 900mm freestanding oven/stove. Accommodation is generous too with 4 robed bedrooms including the main with a walk in wardrobe and a stylish ensuite to match the family bathroom and downstairs powder room. Ducted heating is included for winter comfort and there's also a single garage with remote door internal access and roll through access to the north facing rear yard that is easily maintained. A great location completes the picture with central Clayton's buses, trains, shops and cafes all just a short walk away making this a great proposition for occupiers and investors alike.

Description:
Brilliant Start in Brilliant Location
This nicely presented 3 bedroom brick home is located in one of the most sought after locations in Clayton South, bringing everything together for first home buyers, downsizers and investors.
3 large bedrooms all have BIRs, master with en suite. Additional central bathroom with laundry, living and dining area with open plan updated kitchen which opens to decked backyard, making it the perfect entertainers home.
Walking distance to Westall train station, Westall Secondary College and local shops. A short distance to Clayton shopping strip, Springvale shopping centre and Springvale Homemaker Centre.
Other features include: reverse-cycle split system in living and all 3 bedrooms; undercover porch; undercover decking; large shed for storage.

Description:
When Quality, Space & Location Count
If you are looking for a quality master craft built family home close to all facilities, the wait is over. On entering this beautiful home with magnificent 'Tassie Oak' polished floorboards throughout there is a spacious lounge, master bedroom with ensuite and an adjacent powder room & storage room. Move on through to the chefs' kitchen with stainless steel appliances & breakfast bench and huge dining and living area. Upstairs' there is 2 double bedrooms, bathroom and separate toilet. The home has ducted cooling and ducted heating throughout.
Relax & entertain outdoors on the covered deck in total privacy with manicured gardens. Secure the car in the remote lockup garage with back yard access and space for 2 other cars in the driveway.
All this within walking distance to parks, sporting fields, schools, Clayton Shopping Centre, bowling club, train station and Monash Medical Centre and much more! This home is a pleasure to offer for sale and a must to inspect.
For inspections see opens time or private inspections contact Wayne on 8669 0562 or 0412 083 738

Description:
Prime Development Opportunity
This three bedroom weatherboard house is set on a large flat block measuring approximately 876m2. The extra wide frontage (20m) makes it ideal for multi unit development (STCA).
The potential to build up to four dwellings (STCA) in this quiet and convenient location - just a short walk to Westall Station and local shops - means this a development opportunity that will not last long.
Get in touch today.
Details:
- Land size: 876m2
- 20m frontage
- Three bedroom weatherboard house set on large, flat block
- Quiet and convenient location (short walk to Westall Station and shops)
- Potential to build up to 4 units (subject to council approval)
- Flexible terms available

Description:
Invest or Move Straight In!
Occupying a child friendly corner allotment with the vast expanses of Heatherton Park just metres away, this single storey brick veneer residence is in ideal condition with next to nothing to do. Drenched in loads of natural light and perfect for first home buyers or investors, features include a formal entry, sunny front living room, brand new kitchen with Bosch stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop and thick new timber benchtops, 3 bedrooms two with built-in robes, immaculate bathroom with bath, separate shower and updated vanity unit, separate laundry, toilet, tasteful neutral decor and freshly polished timber floors. The easily maintained allotment includes a carport, garden shed and ample extra hard standing for a boat or caravan. Heatherton Park is accessed via a quiet cul-de-sac at the end of the street and there's excellent proximity to local schools, Springvale Shopping Centre, IKEA, Spring Valley Golf Club and the Monash Freeway.
Photo ID Required at all Open for Inspections.

Description:
A court located 3 bedroom home in beautiful condition
With its quiet yet handy court position, surprising space and many improvements, this home has plenty to impress any occupier or investors.
As with any great home it begins with its location and this home is with in minutes of everything from The Grange Reserve and buses to local shops and Westall primary and secondary schools. Surrounded by lovely gardens, the home is light and airy with pale paint tones adding an extra sense of space. Living options include a formal lounge/dining room that is complemented by a porcelain tiled family/meals area incorporating the vast renovated kitchen with stainless cooking appliances. There are 3 robed bedrooms and 2 renovated bathrooms including a semi ensuite in the main bedroom. Ducted heating and 2 air conditioners provide additional comfort and outside you find a open and secured carports plus a covered patio, deck and a lush backyard with a handy garden shed.
Be Tran : 0434 678 818

Description:
A STYLISH & BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED HOME ON AROUND 865SQM
In a court like position, this classic mottled cream brick home resting on a huge block of around 865sqm has been beautifully renovated throughout leaving its new owner nothing to do but move in, relax and enjoy it all. Fronted by a brick and steel picket and an exposed aggregate driveway, the home has instant street appeal and inside you take in the fresh paint, polished floors and great natural light that enters through big picture windows. You'll enjoy features including a formal entry, generous lounge and a dining area adjoining the stylish and practical kitchen with stainless appliances including a freestanding Blanco 900mm oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes plus a beautifully detailed family bathroom, separate toilet and an impressive laundry. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide additional comfort and outside you find a double garage and plenty of parking for additional vehicles plus a covered entertaining patio overlooking the massive backyard. Backing wetlands near Namatjira Park, the home is within minutes from Schools, transport and central Clayton.
Insights: 11 Brentwood Close, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Tranquil Family Oasis With a Pool
Beyond a stunning Liquid Amber, an elegant family sanctuary has cleverly evolved over time being updated and extended to accommodate a modern family lifestyle. Situated on a substantial landscaped garden allotment (871sqm approx) this beautifully lush garden oasis is designed for serene and private indoor/outdoor living and entertaining. The meticulously maintained interior proportions are introduced by a tranquil L-shape lounge/dining zone that blends flawlessly with a pristine kitchen/meals and family room that opens out to an expansive entertaining area (built-in BBQ and sauna) and gas heated pool, surrounded by luxuriant garden offering seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining. A large main bedroom is enhanced by immaculate ensuite/walk-in robe and is accompanied by three further robed bedrooms and bright family bathroom. Comfortably appointed featuring gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, large laundry and single garage yet offering enticing future redevelopment potential if so desired (STCA). Fabulously located close to schools, train station and local shops.

Description:
** AUCTION THIS SATURDAY @ 11AM **
4 BEDROOM GEM WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE TO TRAIN STATION
If you've been looking for a 4 bedroom home on a great sized block then look no further. Sitting on approximately 633 square metres, this neat and tidy home will instantly please. Featuring 4 good sized bedrooms, main with ensuite and all with built in robes, large lounge room and separate dining. The kitchen is well appointed and has been updated recently. Underneath the carpet throughout the home you will find polished hard wood floors that would instantly bring a more modern feel to the home. Other Features include - Ducted heating, a 4,500 litre water tank, an oversized double garage with a functional work shop. Conveniently placed within walking distance to the redeveloped Westall Train Station, Bus stop, Primary and Secondary schools and minutes from Monash and East Link arterials and Springvale Home maker centre. Inspect today!

Description:
FANTASTIC LOCATION! MODERN, STYLISH TOWNHOUSE!
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, local schools & parklands, bus stop at your door, Clayton shopping district, Clayton Community Centre and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre & Monash University.
This architecturally designed townhouse with extreme craftsmanship throughout featuring ensuite to master bedroom, 2 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, European Oak flooring, high-end appliances and finishings, modern bathrooms with full height mirrors, high ceilings, alarm system, emporite kitchen with solid benchtops and undermount sinks, remote controlled garage, plus low maintenance courtyard perfect for entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
DECEASED ESTATE
There really isn't much to tell about the home itself because quite obviously it has seen far better days. But there are many advantages to its location and it offers obvious potential for the future - all it needs is someone with the right vision to make it happen. On approximately 600sqm of flat land is a great position with no through traffic, the home features a lounge, kitchen/meals area, 2 bedrooms, a family bathroom plus another living or bedroom area with adjoining kitchenette. But it really would be best if you just bowled it over and started from scratch! And with a blank canvass you are free to dream, design and build a family home (STCA) that caters to your every need and want that your family has. A great location just seals the deal with Westall Secondary College literally over the back fence, Westall Primary School is next door and you can walk to buses, local shops and Westall train station.
MUST AND WILL BE SOLD!

Description:
Limitless Opportunities
Fantastic opportunity to secure this neat brick veneer residence, brilliantly located within walking distance to Clayton shopping strip, train station, schools and parks, as well as only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
This home is ideal to live in as it is, whilst updating to build your family dream home at your convenience, and is situated on a huge parcel measuring approximately 721sqm with an extra-large wide frontage of approximately 21m. Alternatively redevelop this upcoming prime piece of real estate (STCA).
Representing a unique opportunity for your future, take advantage now of the limitless choices available to you.
Chris Karantzas : 0413 944 034

Description:
STUNNING BUILD QUALITY & A GREAT FAMILY PACKAGE
The old saying 'they don't make them like they used to' is often overused but could not be more relevant to this property. The excellent build quality has stood the test of time impressively well. From its double brick ground floor to its suspended concrete slab top floor and beautiful detailing in between, it is testament to the owners who built it and now you have an opportunity to secure it for your family. Behind its classic facade you find an entry highlighted by its Italian marble tread staircase and gorgeous parquetry floors that feature throughout much of the home. The generous lounge is accompanied by a formal dining room and the immaculate kitchen with electric oven and stove plus a dishwasher. There are 4 large bedrooms with built in wardrobes upstairs including the main that opens to the large front balcony as well as a family bathroom and toilet on each level. The addition of hydronic heating is a rare treat and outside you find a tandem garage with an internal access door and a roll through door to the large north facing backyard. A great location completes the picture with buses and Westall primary and secondary schools right around the corner while Westall train station is just a few minutes away.
Insights: 14 Durham Place, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Residence in Desirable Location!/ Under Contract
Surrounded by all that Clayton has to offer, this beautifully updated 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home will surely be snapped up quickly.
This prized property is comprised of a wide entrance hall opening to formal lounge with bay window and open fire place, separate dining room, fully renovated modern kitchen with s/s appliances including dishwasher, very spacious family/meals area, huge master bedroom with extended retreat and ensuite, rear undercover entertainers deck, double tandem lock up garage and big drive way to accommodate several cars. Some bonus extras include ducted heating and a couple of air conditioners. All this located on a good size block of approx. 701 sqm. Perfect for the family to enjoy or perhaps to build a unit at the back (STCA). Walk to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Shops, Monash Medical Centre and with Monash University just minutes away, what more could you ask for? Call Rene Wrzos on 0413 330 357
Insights: 16 Springfield Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
672m2 OF LAND TO FURTHER DEVELOP WALK TO CLAYTON CENTRAL!
Situated in one of Clayton's finest streets is this wonderful 3 bedroom home appealing to both the homebuyer, investor and the developer within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre, local schools, parklands and Clayton Central Shopping District will sure get the blood boiling in anyone looking to renovate/multi-develop on this massive block of land.
Comprising: 3 large bedrooms, central bathroom with separate toilet, a generous allotment of 672 sqm approx. with fantastic dual occupancy potential to develop at the rear or multi-unit development site (S.T.C.A.).
Land Dimension: 15.14m x 45.68m = 672sqm approx.
Deposit: 10%
Settlement: 30/60 days
